hero.title: Agrotrack — Ground-truth data for smarter agriculture
hero.subtitle: We connect farmers, NGOs, and agri-enterprises with actionable crop timelines and insights.

about.title: About Agrotrack
about.lead: Agrotrack is a farmer-first data intelligence and connectivity platform built to modernize agricultural planning.
about.story: We are five B.Tech founders with agricultural roots and internship experience in the sector. We saw the same problem again and again: companies and institutions act on incomplete information, while farmers lack timely advice. Agrotrack builds a privacy-first data layer that turns field events into insights — so companies can plan better and farmers get the right support at the right time.
about.missionText: To bridge the information gap between fields and organizations, improving farm productivity and enabling smarter agri-decision making.

pilot.title: Pilot Program — Bihar
pilot.desc: Our first pilot focuses on rice farmers in Bihar. We'll measure sowing windows, stage timelines, and targeted outreach effectiveness.

forNgos.title: Partnering with NGOs & FPOs
forNgos.desc: We offer free analytics dashboards for partner NGOs and tools to digitize farmer records.
